how 2 book risd spaces
  • Ewing House
    1. check availability on their calendar
    2. make a reservation and wait 2-3 business days
    3. if you need immediate confirmation, call 401-277-4908

  • Taproom + Carr Haus Conference Room
    1. email taproom@risd.edu
    • the room
    • date/time
    • your phone number
      1. if they don’t reply soon, visit CSI (2nd floor Carr Haus) and talk to the drop-in advisor directly

  • Old Library
    1. email reserveclassroom@risd.edu
    2. if they don’t reply, email Holly Pimentel (hpimente@risd.edu)

  • Chace Center Auditorium
    1. email Pamela Kimel (pkimel@risd.edu)
    2. or call her at 401-454-6505
